EmailTemplate.name: PD-2016-11-15-KubeTurbo Appliance Download.EMAIL-Promotion Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing Turbonomic for Kubernetes on AWS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/kubernetes?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kubeturbo&utm_content=11152016]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name:default=}}, Are you using Kubernetes? Now you can get Turbonomic’s automatable decisions in Kubernetes on AWS. Free. Turbonomic for Kubernetes on AWS <[[https://turbonomic.com/kubernetes/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kubeturbo&utm_content=11152016]]> gives you real-time self-managing Pods. No experts required. You'll spend less time worrying about the performance of your apps and run-away AWS bills and more time building and deploying your applications. <[[https://turbonomic.com/kubernetes?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kubeturbo&utm_content=11152016]]> Know someone who’s got applications running on Kubernetes in the cloud? Forward this email and share the awesomeness.
-The Turbonomic Team
